name: Faint Gleam
description:
Something lives in the dark corridors... Will you be able to get out of his lair?

In the latest version was added:

Nightmare mode: the monster has become stronger and faster and the corridors are darker;
Fixed some bugs and hitboxes;
The game was released in early access;

Latest version: 0.5

Discord: Elley#9585, клей ПВА#8543

The game in development, please let us know about bugs or suggest ideas for the game.

Developers: Elley (programmer), AQWera (tester).
